attributes.action: Give Government Unlimited Money & Stop it being dependent on Taxes & Borrowing!

attributes.background: Make Government stand on its own two feet and get all of it’s money from it’s Central Bank as a grant. Make the Central Bank not have to relie on its reserves and give the Government unlimited funds. This way Public Services & Good Causes are free and not paid for by business or the public! One Love

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
